# Source files
SET ( SOURCES
	rf.cpp
)


# Header files
SET( HEADERS
)

# Include the headers which are generated by uic and moc
# and include additional header
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
	../Base
	../GEO
	../FileIO
	../MSH
	../FEM
	../OGSProject
)

if (Shapelib_FOUND)
	include_directories(${Shapelib_INCLUDE_DIR})
endif (Shapelib_FOUND)


# Create the library
ADD_EXECUTABLE( ogs
	${SOURCES}
	${HEADERS}
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( ogs
	GEO
	MSH
	FEM
	OGSProject
)

if (WIN32)
	if (GEM_REACT)
		target_link_libraries( ogs qd debug GEMS3_dbg optimized GEMS3_rl )
	endif (GEM_REACT)
	if (LIS)
		target_link_libraries( ogs lisomp )
		set_target_properties( ogs PROPERTIES LINK_FLAGS "/NODEFAULTLIB:libcmt" )
	endif (LIS)
endif (WIN32)
